description:
Current processing workflow:

Linear Procedures

0.0 Subframe Weight
0.1 Batch/Integrate/Drizzle, possible MURE denoise
0.2 Crop
0.3 Linear red applied to RGB L HA
0.4 Combine RGB
0.5 ABE/DBE (25 close in and move samples individually)
0.6 ID
0.7 Deconvolution of L
0.8 Background Neutralization Blanks Sections
0.9  Photometric Color Calibration
0.95 Optional linear noise reductions:
L-Mask in STF Crush background to black but retain diffraction spikes and other L detail
Preview
L MLT Noise Reduction in Background
Color MLT Noise Reduction in Background

Change to Non-Linear

1.0 HDR Wavelets on both stretched images 4-6 lightness mask activated
1.1  LRBG-L Integration on best HDR Wavelet Layer
1.2  PHOTOSHOP Neat-Image NOISE REDUCTION
1.3 Clip Histogram to Left
1.4 Adjust Colors:  SNCR Green Average Neutral
1.45 Optional additional adjustments:
L-Mask
LHE to .6
Star Reduction
Final Color Adjustments
title: M100 from Deep Sky West
